TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayModeCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartDisplayModeCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class WebPartDisplayModeCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类设计为包含一系列对象。The class is designed to contain a collection of objects. 它主要由控件管理的集合对象。It is used primarily by the control to manage collections of objects. 显示模式是一个网页，其上被指定为当前显示模式下时，将显示一个特殊视图属性。A display mode is a special view of a Web page that appears when it is assigned as the current display mode on the property. Web 部件控件集用来创建页面视图中的用户可以执行特殊任务，如编辑控件，或重新整理页面的布局中使用的显示模式。Display modes are used in the Web Parts control set to create page views in which users can carry out special tasks, such as editing controls, or rearranging the layout of a page. 控件定义了若干种显示模式，其中包括， ， ， ，并。The control defines several display modes, including , , , , and . 引用的显示模式集合属性。The collection of display modes is referenced by the property. 在任何特定的网页上使用 Web 部件控件，某些显示模式下可用。On any particular Web page that uses Web Parts controls, only certain display modes are available. 默认浏览模式的设计模式几乎始终可用，但其他显示模式及其相应的区域类型是页上存在时才可用。The default browse mode and the design mode are nearly always available, but the other display modes are available only if their corresponding zone types are present on the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 跟踪与页面上的可用显示模式的控件及其属性。The control keeps track of the available display modes on a page with its property. 此属性引用对象，其中包含所有支持的显示模式。This property references a object that contains all the supported display modes. 类没有公开的构造函数，因此不能创建你自己的它的新实例。The class does not have an exposed constructor, so you cannot create your own new instance of it. 如果创建自定义对象，并希望它成为集合中的受支持的显示模式的一部分控件，必须继承自类中重写方法，调用基方法，以创建集合，然后通过将任何自定义显示模式添加到集合及其方法。If you create a custom object and want it to be part of the collection of supported display modes in the control, you must inherit from the class, override the method, call the base method to create the collection, and then add any custom display modes to the collection by using its method. 类具有两个公共属性。The class has two public properties. 属性是只读的属性，该值指示集合是只读的。The property is a read-only property that indicates whether the collection is read-only. 重载属性提供对集合的成员的访问。The overloaded property provides access to the members of the collection. 类还具有几种方法。The class also has several methods. 方法中，前面所述，可以添加到集合的对象。The method, already mentioned, enables you to add objects to the collection. 方法确定集合中是否存在特定显示模式。The method determines whether a particular display mode exists in the collection. 方法将集合复制到一个对象数组。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 方法返回集合中特定显示模式的索引。The method returns the index of a particular display mode within the collection. 最后，方法使您能够显示模式对象插入集合中特定索引处。Finally, the method enables you to insert a display mode object at a particular index in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates working with the class. 关键点是必须继承自类并重写方法来添加自定义对象传递给创建集合控件。The key point is that you must inherit from the class and override the method to add a custom object to the collection created by the control. 此代码示例包含五个部分：This code example has five parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载其他控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 驻留在用户控制Web 页面上的区域并使您能够输入和显示在标签中的文本。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 包含两个控件的源的代码文件。A source code file that contains two controls. 一个是一个自定义控制; 另一个是自定义要添加到页面的默认显示模式对象。One is a custom control; the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 该示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 代码示例中，用户控件，从中可以更改显示模式的第一部分的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the first part of the code example, the user control that lets you change display modes, comes from another topic. 若要运行此代码示例，对于需要获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例中的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含两个控件，用户控件和自定义控件。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 请注意`Register`在页面顶部的指令来引用用户控件和编译控件的命名空间。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分是用于输入和显示文本的用户控件。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 请注意，它使用控件创建的用户界面 (UI) 的多个视图。Notice that it uses a control to create multiple views of the user interface (UI). 将显示按钮，而无需另一个视图。One view is displayed with the button, the other without. 请注意，在重写`OnPreRender`方法中，代码检查以查看和页面当前是否在自定义显示模式下，如果是，它显示用户控件，其中包括按钮的第一个视图。Notice that the in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode, and if so, it displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果页面不在自定义显示模式下 （例如，如果页是在浏览或设计模式下），则按钮处于隐藏状态。If the page is not in the custom display mode (for example, if the page is in browse or design mode), the button is hidden. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 该示例的第四个部分是两个自定义类的源文件。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 请注意，自定义类将重写方法，调用基方法，以添加所有的默认显示模式，然后添加自定义显示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自定义显示模式类`InLineEditDisplayMode`，只需继承、 在构造函数中设置的显示模式的名称和重写的基属性来建立自定义显示的特征数。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要运行的代码示例，请加载浏览器中的页。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 请注意页面目前在浏览模式中，没有按钮可见。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改到的页**内联编辑显示**模式，并请注意，现在按钮是在较低的用户控件中可见。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the button is visible in the lower user control. 添加一些文本，然后单击更新管理按钮。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 请注意页面显示返回到浏览模式，现在显示您输入的文本，按钮再次处于隐藏状态，因为页面不是在自定义显示模式下。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is not in the custom display mode.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法以添加新到现有对象对象。You can use the method to add new objects to an existing object. 创建自定义时，可以在其中实现此方案的一个示例类，并且你想要将其添加到页面上的受支持的显示模式的集合。An example of a scenario in which you would do this is when you create a custom class, and you want to add it to the collection of supported display modes on a page. 若要做到这一点，您必须从继承类并重写其方法，首先调用基方法，然后使用方法向集合添加自定义显示模式。To do that, you must inherit from the class and override its method, first calling the base method, and then using the method to add the custom display mode to the collection. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用类。This code example demonstrates the use of the class. 有关完整的代码以及运行该示例中，所需的说明，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段出现在派生类，并重写方法，并将自定义显示模式添加到集合。The following section of code occurs in a derived class that overrides the method and adds a custom display mode to the collection. [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等于集合，然后中项的数目`value`追加到集合的末尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否为只读。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集变化的不同时间点集合的内容在内部更改属性值。The property value is changed internally by the Web Parts control set as it changes the contents of the collection at different points. 例如后,控件已添加所有受支持的显示模式向其集合，它在内部设置到只读模式，以防止它被更改的对象。For example, after the control has added all supported display modes to its collection, it internally sets the object to read-only to prevent it from being changed. > [!NOTE] > 尽管你可以读取其值没有任何机制来在代码中更改此属性的值。There is no mechanism to change this property value from your code, although you can read its value.
